name: Inline Image Assets
description: File system based image asset manager with charx support and persona assets. Prefers per-character folders under user/images/{characterName}/ via SillyTavern Images API, with fallback to user/files/ when unavailable. Includes bulk delete, ZIP download, migration from legacy base64 and legacy user/files layout, and performance optimizations. Use %%img:name%% tags in chat.
author: User-inspired
